typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DimGeographyKey as integer,
		Region as string,
		SubRegion as string,
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedBy as integer,
		sysCreatedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sdimgeography
source(output(
		SourceItemId as integer,
		name as string,
		{alpha-2} as string,
		{alpha-3} as string,
		{country-code} as string,
		{iso_3166-2} as string,
		region as string,
		{sub-region} as string,
		{intermediate-region} as string,
		{region-code} as string,
		{sub-region-code} as string,
		{intermediate-region-code} as string,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedBy as integer,
		sysCreatedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sstagingcountries
sstagingcountries, sdimgeography join({country-code} == CountryCode,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> smergeresult
smergeresult select(mapColumn(
		name,
		{country-code},
		region = sstagingcountries@region,
		{sub-region},
		DimGeographyKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sreducedset
sreducedset split(isNull(DimGeographyKey),
	disjoint: false) ~> sconditional@(snewitems, existeditems)
sconditional@snewitems sink(input(
		DimGeographyKey as integer,
		Region as string,
		SubRegion as string,
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedBy as integer,
		sysCreatedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ssinkdimgeography
